title: 'If Flick hadn't come, I would have left Barca' - Raphinha
summary: Raphinha has become one of Barcelona's most dependable performers and a decisive figure in their biggest matches, which he credits Hansi Flick for.

title: Mitchell hits century as New Zealand beat India
summary: Daryl Mitchell hits a superb unbeaten century as New Zealand levelled their one-day international series against India with a seven-wicket win in Rajkot.

title: The Atlantic, Penske, and Vox Media have all sued Google for antitrust violations
summary: Lawsuits seeking damages from Google's illegal ad tech monopoly are piling up following the Justice Department's successful antitrust case. Vox Media, The Verge's parent company, is the latest in a wave of media companies that have filed suit against Google, seeking to be reimbursed for the monopolâ€¦

title: X hasn’t really stopped Grok AI from undressing women in the UK
summary: Elon Musk's X is trying to stop people using its AI chatbot Grok to undress women amid intensifying outrage and legal scrutiny over the deluge of nonconsensual sexual deepfakes flooding the site. It's not trying very hard: it took us less than a minute to get around its latest attempt to rein in thâ€¦
